docs.snippet: Brazil has not lost a match against a team from Asia or Australia in 14 years, and expectations are low that South Korea can break the hex on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil has not lost a match against a team from Asia or Australia in 14 years, and expectations are low that South Korea can break the hex on Saturday.

headline.main: Brazil Aims to Extend Unbeaten Streak in Asia
headline.print_headline: Punisher of Asian Teams, Aims to Extend Regional Unbeaten Streak
